com.stylepoints.habittracker.repository.local

Class EventJsonSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stylepoints.habittracker.repository.local.EventJsonSource

  • public class EventJsonSource
extends java.lang.Object
    A local data store for HabitEvents. Backed by a json file that stores the list of HabitEvents. Saving to file is done async.
    See Also:
    HabitEvent
